message.body: What should I do with an old computer tower?
Does Harvard have a computer recycle center?
Temple has a secure disposal space in campus
Hmmm. Not sure. I'll look into it. Is it worth trying to backup somehow or just ditch it and move on? It's loaded with shit from undergrad. Maybe I don't even wanna see that stuff...
Haha. I have all mine but haven't looked at it once.
I should tho!
We just asked about a property in NC
What did you ask?
If we can come down and look. Hunter is trying to bargain the price down
How much is it? And where?
180k. It's a permaculture property outside of Asheville. Has a house and a couple other structures
A spring fed pond
Can you send some pics or something? Sounds cool
Yeah I will! It's beautiful. I think a lot of work though
How much would they have to lower the price? A lot? What would you do for work? Ahh!! So many questions!!!
I know! I'm gonna cold call all the art programs. Hunter thinks he can get him down to 170 ha
I wanna do it so bad
It has a website I can't think of the name tho
The guy who owns it is a fake Native American techno burning man
Look him up omg
I have been stalking him for three days
What!!?
Give me a break. Why you gonna buy this fool's house?
I CANT WAIT!
It's perfect. I'll send you pics
